level.heading: SERVICE OF PLEADINGS AND OTHER DOCUMENTS (ยง 15-115)

level.text: Petitions and applications, when filed with the Commission, shall be served on the Office of the People’s Counsel of the District of Columbia.

Cross complaints, intervening petitions, answers, amendments, written motions, and all other documents shall be served by the parties within one (1) day after the pleading is filed with the Commission.
When filed, these pleadings and other documents shall be accompanied by proof of service upon all parties.
Proof of service of any pleading or any other document shall be by certificate of attorney, affidavit or affirmation, or receipt.
